caption.p: Contents of RA in Satureja khuzistanica plants derived under in vitro and in vivo conditions. (A) Content of rosmarinic acid in nodal segments cultures of S. khuzistanica treated with different concentrations of MeJA and MWCNTs. (B) Content of rosmarinic acid in in vivo plants treated with 100 mg/L MWCNTs and 200 mg/L SA at different time points. The levels of rosmarinic acid in each sample were analysed by HPLC. Different letters indicate significant differences (Duncan’s multiple range test, p < 0.05). Bars represent means ± SD.
